charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Sentenced to 151 months imprisonment to be followed by 3 years supervised release and $100.00 S/A with $1066.03 Restitution

charges.charge_description: By intimidation, unlawfully and knowingly take from the person and from the presense of an emplyee of the Bank of the West, $2048.00 in U.S. currency. in Violation 18:2113(a) [3:05-m-5473]

charges.charge_disposition: Sentenced to 77 months imprisonment to be followed by 3 years non-reporting supervised release and $100.00 S/A with restitution of $1,066.03
